category: Member city/provincial sports association regulations/Article 1 (basis and name)
contents: Article 1 (Basis and Name) ① This regulation governs matters related to the organization and operation of member city/provincial sports associations as member organizations of the Korea Sports Council (hereinafter referred to as *Sports Council) in accordance with Articles 7 and 13-3 of the Articles of Incorporation. decide Revised 2017. 3. 23., 2021. 10. 6., 2023. 7. 5. ② The name of the member city/provincial sports association is added to the name of the local government in accordance with Article 33-2 (3) of the National Sports Promotion Act. 'Athletics Association' is used, and its English name is determined separately. Revised 2021. 10. 6.
